BSseeker2
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which BSseeker2 installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using BSseeker2, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load BSseeker2/2.1.8-iccifort-2019.5.281-Python-2.7.16
```
